briefTitle: Develop and Evaluate the Effectiveness of a Self-Care Smartphone Application on the Self-Efficacy, and Resilience Among Newly Diagnosed Breast Cancer Patients Undergoing Treatment
officialTitle: Develop and Evaluate the Effectiveness of a Self-Care Smartphone Application on the Self-Efficacy, and Resilience Among Newly Diagnosed Breast Cancer Patients Undergoing Treatment
conditions: Breast Cancer, Breast Neoplasm, Breast Malignant Tumor, Resilience, Self-efficacy
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Consciousness clear, over 20 years old, can communicate in Mandarin and Taiwanese
* Diagnosed Breast Cancer I-III stage
* undergo first chemotherapy
* Have a smartphone
* Receiving treatment: EC/ EC+T/LC/LC+T E: (Epirubicin)、C: (Cyclophosphamide)、L: (Lipo-Dox)、T: (Taxotere)

Exclusion Criteria:

* DSM-V mentally ill
* IOS system smartphone
* over 65 years old
